channel.title: Seedlings on COTTON
channel.description: Recent content in Seedlings on COTTON

item.title: GhAAO2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A09G0970.1 Gene Symbol: GhAAO2 Gene Name: abscisic acid aldehyde oxida 2 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhAAO2 was observed responding to NaHCO3 stress in cotton compared to AAO family genes.

item.title: GhDREB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhDREB1 Gene Name: DREB-like transcription factor Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton GhDREB1 increases plant tolerance to low temperature and is negatively regulated by gibberellic acid.

item.title: GhGLU19A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A04G0109 Gene Symbol: GhGLU19A Gene Name: Glucanase 19 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Suppression of GhGLU19 encoding β-1,3-glucanase promotes seed germination in cotton.

item.title: GhGLU19D
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D05G3612 Gene Symbol: GhGLU19D Gene Name: Glucanase 19 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Suppression of GhGLU19 encoding β-1,3-glucanase promotes seed germination in cotton.

item.title: GhHSP24.7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhHSP24.7 Gene Name: Genome: M-1 reference genome Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The regulation circuit composed of GhHSP24.

item.title: GhMT3a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhMT3a Gene Name: Metallothionein-like Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton metallothionein GhMT3a, a reactive oxygen species scavenger, increased tolerance against abiotic stress in transgenic tobacco and yeast.

item.title: GhMYC2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D12G2074 Gene Symbol: GhMYC2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhMYC2 activates cytochrome P450 gene CYP71BE79 to regulate gossypol biosynthesis in cotton.

item.title: GhRCD1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A08G1390 Gene Symbol: GhRCD1 Gene Name: Genome: G.
